# Changelog

## 9.6.0

**Breaking change**: RSA keys generated using the SHA-1 hash algorithm
were disabled by OpenSSH due to a security vulnerability. If you find
your RSA key does not work after update you will need to make a new key
with a stronger alg
attributes.title: Terminal & SSH

attributes.release_summary:
## v0.108.2 [2022-06-03]
* Switched to ignoring 'upgrade' backups by default for new users.
* Added a warning for existing users if you're not ignoring upgrade backups.
* Added a warning about google's OOB deprecation for private credential users.
